perturbation.original_text:
DEFINITIONS
The DEFINITIONS section of the contract is amended to include the following:
Service Center. Where this contract is administered. Our Service Center address is 4321 North Ballard Road, Appleton, WI 54919-0001.
perturbation.changed_text:
DEFINITIONS
The DEFINITIONS section of the contract is amended to include the following:
Service Center. Where this contract is administered. Our Service Center address may change at any time without notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states a specific address for the Service Center. The changed text introduces uncertainty by stating the address can change at any time without notice, contradicting the initial definition and making it unclear where the contract is administered.

perturbation.original_text:
MEMBERSHIP. The person(s) named as the Insured(s) or the Annuitant(s) is a benefit member of the Society. Rights and privileges of
membership are set forth in the Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws of the Society. These rights and privileges are separate from the ownership
of this contract.
perturbation.changed_text: MEMBERSHIP. The person(s) named as the Insured(s) or the Annuitant(s) is a benefit member of the Society. Rights and privileges of membership may be revoked or altered by the Society at any time, without prior notice or recourse. These rights and privileges are separate from the ownership of this contract.
perturbation.explanation: The original text implies a stable set of membership rights defined by the Articles and Bylaws. The changed text introduces uncertainty by stating that these rights can be revoked or altered at any time, contradicting the original implication of stable rights. It makes the value of membership unpredictable.

perturbation.original_text:
DIVIDENDS. Each year, we will determine our divisible surplus. This contractâ€™s share, if any, will be credited as a dividend. Since we do not expect
this contract to contribute to divisible surplus, it is not expected that any dividends will be credited.
perturbation.changed_text: DIVIDENDS. Each year, we will determine our divisible surplus. This contract's share may or may not be credited as a dividend, at the sole discretion of the Society, regardless of divisible surplus. While it is not currently expected that any dividends will be credited, the Society reserves the right to issue them based on factors not explicitly defined in this contract.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states dividends are based on divisible surplus, but then says dividends are not expected. The modified version completely undermines the link to divisible surplus by saying dividends are at the 'sole discretion of the Society' and based on 'factors not explicitly defined'. This introduces a contradiction, because while the contract says divisible surplus is considered, the payment of dividends is now arbitrary, making it uncertain when dividends will or will not be credited.
